title: Volker Kuster
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809050311/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809050311/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Volker Küster**

Born 1941 Wernigerode, Germany.  
Book designer, type designer, teacher. He worked at Typoart and Scangraphic where he designed Today Sans Serif. Since 1989 professor for type design and typography at Essen University.
author: k.l.
